{"title": "The Falconeer", "title_search": "the falconeer", "title_keyword": "the falconeer", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/the-falconeer/", "summary": "Generations of poisonous decisions and treason swirl in the deep, as factions collide. Become the Falconeer and soar through the skies aboard a devastatingly powerful Warbird. Uncover secrets lost to the sea as you join or oppose different factions and clans scattered throughout The Great Ursee.
